node.detail_zh: 患者過往健康良好，2019 年 12 月至 2020 年 6 月 30 日曾到印度，返港後由檢疫中心送院，沒有病徵。與第 #1231 宗個案患者有關連。
node.detail_en: The patient has good past health, was in India between December 2019 and June 30, 2020, and was hospitalised from quarantine centre upon return to Hong Kong, having exhibited no symptoms. The patient's case is epidemiologically linked to that of patient #1231.
